name: Biku Biku
description:
Install instructions

Currently, the file is only compressed to .zip  and can be easily uncompressed on any desktop computer without any problem. For future updates, I will include the changes installation process of the game to settle the licence and installation instruction of the program.

Steps for installation:

1. Download the file (It's free)

2. Either open the file or right-click on the file and click the option "uncompress " or "extract ." You may choose what output directory where the file go. (Archiver Softwares: WinRAR, BandZiP, etc.)

3. After the extraction ends, open the folder.

4. Find the "Biku-Biku.exe" file and run it by double clicking it or clicking it once and pressing enter.

For more info/s and support or any concerns, you may contact the dev using the email address provided below.
